sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { CBadge, CDropdown, CDropdownItem, CDropdownMenu, CDropdownToggle, CProgress } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' const TheHeaderDropdownNotif = ({notificationCount,Messages=[]}) => { console.log(Messages) const itemsCount = notificationCount; return ( {itemsCount} You have {itemsCount} notifications {Messages.map((item)=>{ return alert(item.id)}> {item.text} })} ) } export default TheHeaderDropdownNotif
